dcterms:description: A hyperspectral image of the city of Pavia (Italy) taken by the airborne ROSIS-03 optical sensor, consisting of 102 spectral bands with a spatial resolution of 1.3m. The dataset includes 5 classes of interest and a labeled dataset of 206,009 pixels extracted by visual inspection.
dcterms:title: Hyperspectral VHR (Pavia)

dcterms:creator: Q. Jackson
D. Landgrebe
dcterms:description: A 220-bands AVIRIS image taken over Indianaâ€™s Indian Pine test site in June 1992, containing 16 classes representing different crops and a total of 10,366 labeled pixels. This dataset is a classical benchmark for validating model accuracy.
dcterms:title: Hyperspectral MR (Indian Pines)

dcterms:creator: D. Tuia
F. Pacifici
M. Kanevski
W. J. Emery
dcterms:description: A 4-bands QuickBird scene of a suburb of Zurich, Switzerland, taken in 2002. The dataset includes 9 classes of interest extracted by visual inspection, with a spatial resolution of 2.4m and additional contextual bands derived from morphological operators.
dcterms:title: Multispectral VHR (Zurich)
